statements.statement: I was doing my regular patrol when I saw a tall man in a dark hoodie run past the east parking lot at approximately 11:45 PM. He was carrying a black backpack and appeared to be limping slightly on his right leg. I'd estimate his height at around 6 feet, maybe 6'1". He had a slim build. I tried to follow but he disappeared around the corner toward Main Street.

I was working late in my office on the 2nd floor when I heard glass breaking around 11:30 PM. It was definitely from upstairs. About 10 minutes later, maybe 11:40, I looked out my window and saw someone exit through the back emergency door. It was dark so I couldn't see well, but they seemed medium height, wearing jeans and what looked like a baseball cap. They moved quickly toward the back alley.
key_observations: Person exited via back emergency door around 11:40 PM

statements.statement: I was making a late delivery to the building next door around 11:20 PM. I noticed a white sedan, maybe a Toyota or Honda, parked oddly near the Tech Corp building - like they were trying to stay in the shadows. The driver was sitting inside. Male, looked maybe 30s, I think he had a beard. Short dark hair. When I walked past, he seemed nervous and looked away. The car had local plates but I didn't get the number.
key_observations: White sedan (Toyota or Honda) parked suspiciously

statements.statement: I checked all the offices on the 3rd floor at exactly 10 PM as part of my routine. Room 304 was definitely locked and everything looked normal through the window. The executive desk area was tidy, all drawers closed. I have a master key but didn't enter. When I came back at midnight after the alarm, the window in room 304 was completely shattered and the place was ransacked. I saw muddy footprints leading from the window to the desk and then toward the emergency exit.
key_observations: Window shattered when returned at midnight
Muddy footprints from window to desk to emergency exit
